task.title: How to Synchronize with Other Devices
task.shortdesc: Here you will learn to use one device to remotely control listening on another.

taskbody.prereq: When connecting to a speaker for the first time, all devices need to be on the same WiFi.

step.cmd: Tap the monitor and speaker icon at the bottom-left corner.
Pick the device you want to play on.

taskbody.result: You can use your phone to control Spotify on the other device
